data.content:
adjective
itchier; -est
feeling or having an itch
My eyes are/feel itchy.
itchy skin
an itchy back
causing an itch
an itchy rash
This sweater is itchy.
informal :feeling a strong desire to do something, to change something, etc.
Voters are itchy for change.
He was itchy to get going.
If you have itchy feet, you have a strong desire to leave a place, job, etc., and go somewhere else.
She's had the same job for five years, and she's starting to get itchy feet.
If you have an itchy finger or itchy fingers, you have a strong desire to do or get something, especially something that other people think is wrong or dangerous.
a movie about a gunman who has an itchy (trigger) finger [=a gunman who wants to shoot his gun; a gunman who is eager or likely to shoot someone]
